pullrequest.title: pass string literal to project() to make the project name parsable

content.raw: The goal to have a literal string as the project comes from the fact that this project provides no meta information at all. From an automation point of view neither the name of the project nor its dependencies are declared anywhere. A human can read the README and follow the instructions a program simply can't. And the minimal information to leverage externally configured information like the dependencies is the name of the project. If the project name is contained as a literal string of the project() call it can be easily extracted.
